Package jeroquest.boardgame

Class Square

java.lang.Object
jeroquest.boardgame.Square
public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
Programming Methodology Practice. Jeroquest - An example of Object Oriented Programming. Class Square - class that represents each one of the squares in the board
Author:
Jorge Puente Peinador y Ramiro Varela Arias, Juan Luis Mateo

    Square()
    Constructor for an empty square (without a character)

      public Piece getPiece()
      Get the piece in this square

      Checks if the square has a piece in it
      Returns:
